summary: This is a brief email exchange between US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) staff regarding a weekly update. The email mentions a 'Tuesday Epstein Nolle conference', indicating a scheduled legal proceeding related to Jeffrey Epstein's case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned in reference to a scheduled legal conference (nolle conference) in his case.

events.title: Epstein Nolle Conference
events.description: A scheduled legal conference (nolle conference) in the case against Jeffrey Epstein, mentioned in an email update between US Attorney's Office staff.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email from August 24, 2019, within the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
It references a scheduled 'Tuesday Epstein Nolle conference', indicating an upcoming legal proceeding in Epstein's case.
The email is a brief update, suggesting ongoing case management and communication within the prosecution team.
